about_the_game:
Life got you in a pickle? Are you always hanging on ’til fry-day? Got beef?

Burger Bois is a food truck simulator game about flavor, not labor. Play as Patty, the accidental owner of a failing bespoke burger business, and launch your new career as the owner-operator of a designer burger truck. Get the vibe for each customer, and craft unique sandwiches from start to finish, turning your customers’ most vague requests into culinary masterpieces.

💡 Dream Up

No menu? No problem!

Customers will tell you the flavors, properties, and restrictions that you have to work with. It’s your job to create a bespoke burger that speaks to their stomach and soul.

🍔 Dish Up

Your customers will pay based on how well you satisfied their cravings. Don’t mess it up too badly, or you might not recoup your costs!

Form relationships with regular customers and follow their stories as you serve up burgers that make or break their days.

🚚 Park Up

Manage your pantry stock, acquire exciting new ingredients, and serve customers as quickly as possible to maximize your revenue.

As your burger business grows, unlock new supplier contracts and more lucrative parking spots. Take your burger truck from a dingy parking lot to a beachside boardwalk to a less dingy parking lot!

---

Burger Bois is a love letter to food and hospitality, with nods to many of our favorite games. We wanted to combine the food service of Good Pizza, Great Pizza, with the creative challenge of Sticky Business, and the quirky, comedic characters of Ace Attorney. 

Key features:

  • Food prep is out. Flavor design is in. Consider the real-world properties and flavors of ingredients to design uniquely satisfying burgers.

  • Who needs a menu anyway? Interpret increasingly vague requests to try and impress your customers.

  • Let’s get experimental. Play with your food to collect over 20 elusive food showcase illustrations.

  • We’re all weird here. Get to know a cast of relatably weird friends, enemies, and customers (who are sometimes also enemies).

  • Lightheartedly cutthroat competition. Manage your truck and boost your reputation to score the hottest parking spots in town!

  • Flavor made real. Share your creations with friends—and even export the recipes so you can taste-test for yourself.
